trends: There has been one other sighting in La Conner
There were no other sightings in La Conner on or around July 16th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting in living room, facing east, out of the corner of my eye saw an orange colored ORB behind the trees headed north and about 2 miles out. Did not look like a normal aircraft since Im by a Navy Air Base and in a commercial flight path. Ran out side, watched it come to a complete stop, hovering, I ran in the house , got my camera. When I got back out side it was in the same position, then started moveing towards the east, I got one picture.
